Class ColorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.utils.ColorUtils

  • public class ColorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements some color related helpers methods. This code is based on js-code written by alteredq http://alteredqualia.com/
    Author:
    thothbot

      • adjustHSV

        public static void adjustHSV(Color color,
             double h,
             double s,
             double v)
        This method adjusts color by defined values of H, S, V
        Parameters:
        color - the Color instance
        h - the hue
        s - the saturation
        v - the value

      • rgbToHsv

        public static ColorUtils.HSV rgbToHsv(Color color)
        This method will make new HSV instance and sets color value from color instance Based on: MochiKit implementation by Bob Ippolito
        Parameters:
        color - the color instance
        Returns:
        the new HSV instance
